title: The Hottie Next Door: Good Girls Don't / Drop Dead Sexy / Virgin Seeks Bad-Ass Boy
description: In this steamy collection curious, inexperienced women learn a lesson in love from a sexy neighbor. These three novellas, "Good Girls Don’t" by Shiloh Walker, Elisa Adams’s "Drop Dead Sexy," and "Virgin Seeks Bad-Ass Boy" by Ruth D. Kerce will leave readers yearning for more.
author: Shiloh Walker
